articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army of the DPRK, visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and congratulated its teachers and students on the lunar New Year. 
					After receiving a salute, he shook the hands of leading officials of the school one by one. He went to the stand for a photo session, saying he came to the school to see how the students were enjoying the lunar New Year.
					
					He approached the students with tears in their eyes and patted their red cheeks. He warmly took their hands, kindly asking why they did not wear gloves in such cold weather.
					
					He went round the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing at the school.
					
					The President and leader Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to the students of the school to train them as a backbone of the revolution, always thinking of them, he said.
					
					Noting that the students of the school are the precious treasures of the revolution as they will always take the lead in upholding the Songun revolutionary leadership of the WPK, he underlined the need to train them as men strong in faith always sharing the destiny with the Party just as their fathers and mothers did.
					
					He made the rounds of the room for education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the school.
					
					Standing before the uniforms of students, he said the red bands on sleeves carry profound meanings. He earnestly told them not to forget the noble desire of the great persons of Mt. Paektu reflected in them.
					
					He went round different lecture rooms and laboratories having modern educational environment and scientific and educational facilities under the care of the WPK to learn in detail about the education at the school.
					
					He looked round the bedrooms of students, mess hall, children's union room and youth league room to learn about their living.
					
					He urged the school to conduct educational work well so that all its students may steadfastly succeed to the revolution, not forgetting their origin.
					
					Walking the compound of the school after dusk fell, he asked about what kind of turf was put on the playground. He said he would send good turf to the school and kindly proposed covering outdoor basketball and volleyball courts with rubber mat.
					
					He moved to the gymnasium, telling officials to look round everything despite pressure of time. Feeling the floor with his hand, he said it was necessary to smoothen it better so that the students may not have their knees hurt while exercising. Underlining the need to build the gymnasium better, he said he would send designers.
					
					At an e-library, he saw with keen attention students using computers and took measures for the operation of the computer network.
					
					At their hall he sat on a chair used by them and said it was built well. He learned in detail about its acoustic conditions.
					
					Noting that his visit to the school made him feel as if he had come to his birthplace, adding it offered him an opportunity to renew his determination to carry the revolution to completion.
					
					He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for the education and management of the school having a noble mission to bring up a backbone force, core force which will steadfastly succeed to the Korean revolution.
					
					He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Generals Pak Jae Gyong and Hyon Chol Hae, First Vice Department Director of the C.C., the WPK Ri Jae Il and Vice Department Director of the C.C., the WPK Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Gifts Conveyed to Figure Skaters
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Gifts Conveyed to Figure Skaters
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Figure skaters received gifts of leader Kim Jong Il on Saturday. 
					Kim Jong Il watched a figure skating demonstration in last December and promised to send skates of the best quality to figure skaters.  
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un made sure that best figure skates were procured and sent them to the skaters as gifts of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Yun Jin Il, a 20-year-old figure skater, told KCNA:
					
					"I really miss leader Kim Jong Il. I wish I would perform a demonstration again for him. 
					
					He watched my performance last December and highly appreciated it. And he paid deep concern to our figure skates. 
					
					I will train hard and prove successful in international tournaments to add luster to the honor of the country."  
					
					Pak Chang Il, a 39-year-old coach, said:
					
					"I have never expected that we would receive gifts of leader Kim Jong Il when all the people are still grieved at his demise. 
					
					I don't know how to describe my feelings. 
					
					I will never forget the day when the leader enjoyed a demonstration of figure skaters. 
					
					I will train many able figure skaters, true to his behests, making a contribution to the country's sports development."

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark Lunar New Year's Day
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- A state reception was given at the Mokran House on Monday evening to mark the lunar New Year.
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un provided this significant reception, associated with benevolence of leader Kim Jong Il, on the lunar New Year's Day when the Korean people are greeting with ardent yearning for the leader.
					
					Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and persons of merit.
					
					Choe Thae Bok said in an address that thanks to Kim Jong Il's noble love for the nation lunar New Year's Day came to serve as an important occasion in instilling the Korean people with national pride and honor and patriotism.
					
					The social traits of promoting excellent national traditions has been established in the country and the heyday of national culture in the era of Songun ushered in under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who guided the work to develop the heritage of national culture as required by the demand of the era, the speaker stressed.
					
					True to his intention, Kim Jong Un is now implanting ardent patriotism into the Korean army and people and glorifying the time-honored cultural traditions of the nation generation after generation, the speaker noted, saying:
					
					All the sectors and units should fan up the flames of Hamnam, the flames of industrial revolution in the new century, and thus significantly commemorate the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il and glorify this meaningful year as a year of shining victory when an era of prosperity is unfolding.
					
					A performance was given at the reception by artistes of the Wanjaesan Art Troupe.

articles.title: Triplets Take Part in New Year Performance
articles.content:
Triplets Take Part in New Year Performance
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Triplets enjoyed popularity in an art performance celebrating the Lunar New Year Juche 101 (2012).
					Choe Kwang Ok, Choe Myong Ok and Choe Song Ok sang the song "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Is Our Sun", drawing loud cheers from the audience.
					
					Kim Un Hui, a teacher at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, who had the honor to take part in New Year performances President Kim Il Sung enjoyed, told KCNA:
					
					"The triplets were born in Kosong County, Kangwon Province. Their father is an army officer.
					
					They are learning vocal music at this palace free of charge.
					
					The school and dorm where they study and live are taking good care of them.
					
					They are bringing their talent into full play under the advantageous socialist educational system established by President Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					I am sure that they will become excellent vocalists in the future."
					
					Choe Kwang Ok, who is studying at Kumsong School, said:
					
					"My father and mother usually ask me and my sisters to repay the loving care of Kim Jong Il. We will study vocal music hard to delight the dear respected Kim Jong Un with songs".

articles.title: Flames of Hamnam, Banner for Victory in 2012: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Flames of Hamnam, Banner for Victory in 2012: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- All sectors and units should fan up the flames of Hamnam in order to adorn this year as a year of shining victory when an era of prosperity is unfolding, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il, Rodong Sinmun says in a bylined article on Tuesday.
					The flames of miracle and innovation, kindled in South Hamgyong Province, are the banner of general offensive for great victory in 2012, the banner for a fresh turn, the article says, adding:
					
					The flames of Hamnam represent the stout offensive spirit to carry out the tasks assigned by the party on the highest level in the shortest period, the strong spirit of national self-esteem to advance ahead of the world level of its own accord and the spirit of pioneer to open the gate to prosperity before anybody else at their native places and work sites.
					
					The high national dignity of the people in Hamnam is just the high pride that Kim Il Sung's nation is the most resourceful and intelligent nation in the world, the bold will and gut that it can do anything if it is determined to do and the steadfast fighting spirit to advance ahead of the world with its own strength and technology.
					
					As we near the victory of building a thriving nation and as the sound of our dynamic footsteps becomes louder, the enemies' moves will grow more vicious. But, nothing can break the revolutionary stamina of the descendents of President Kim Il Sung and the soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il who are going through any difficulties with their high national self-esteem no matter how much water may flow under bridge.
					
					If all the sectors and units rise up as South Hamgyong Province did and all the people make redoubled efforts as those in the province did, our country can reach the high eminence of prosperity at an early date. If everyone works miracle and innovation at his or her worksite, going through any trial and hardship with the same disposition of Hamnam forerunners, he or she can become an honorable performer of innovation and merit in the ongoing grand advance.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slashes at Lee Myung Bak's Intention for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slashes at Lee Myung Bak's Intention for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak recently promoted Kim Thae Hyo, a confrontation maniac, thus revealing his sinister intention to persist in the standoff with the DPRK despite the people's desire for improved north-south relations, says Minju Joson Tuesday in a bylined commentary.
					The traitor in his "special New Year address" called for "peace and stability", saying that "door to an opportunity" is opened and "it is important to remove bilateral distrust through dialogue".
					
					His remarks were a deception to hide his black-hearted intention, says the commentary, and goes on:
					
					In actuality the traitor said when being briefed on a report on program of the Unification Ministry that there may "any change" in the DPRK, which revealed that he hopes for any "sudden emergency."
					
					The group of traitors recently let riff-raffs to slander the wailing of the DPRK's army and people over their great loss to the nation as an "orchestrated one". This anti-DPRK propaganda was also prompted by such intention. 
					
					The group tries to launch more vicious moves against its fellow countrymen in the future, but such moves will only accelerate its self-destruction. 
					
					As already declared, the DPRK will force the Lee group to surely pay dearly for its crimes against ethnics.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Demand Probe into Cyber Attacks
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Demand Probe into Cyber Attacks
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Growing stronger in south Korea is the protest of students demanding a probe into the case of cyber attacks on the website of the Central Election Commission by the "Grand National Party".
					The General Student Council of Pusan University and other organizations made public a declaration on situation on Jan. 20 in front of the main entrance of the university.
					
					The declaration branded the Ddos attacks, committed at the time of the October 26 election last year, as an undeniable crime.
					
					The evidence proving the involvement of the GNP and Chongwadae in the case was found one after anther, but the authorities have told a lie so far, it charged.
					
					The case reminds one of the March 15 fraudulent elections by the Syngman Rhee dictatorial forces 50 odd years ago, it said, warning the authorities should be mindful that the traitorous regime set up through such fraudulent elections was toppled by the people. 
					
					It called for introducing a special inspection system to probe the involvement of the GNP and Chongwadae in the case of cyber terrorism and the police's concealment of the case and punishing those responsible for it.
					
					On January 12 students under the south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century, including those of Kyonggi University and Tuksong Women's College, jointly called a press conference.
					
					They denounced the police authorities for attempt to cover up the truth about the case and demanded introduction of the special inspection system for a prompt probe into it.

articles.title: GIs in south Korea Branded as Drug Peddler
articles.content:
GIs in south Korea Branded as Drug Peddler
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- It has been recently disclosed that a GI smuggled a large amount of drug into south Korea. 
					This person serving at a U.S. army unit in Songnam city, Kyonggi Province, secretly introduced a large amount of drug by means of international mail. 
					
					Detected in his lodging was material believed to be identical to drug. 
					
					The fact goes to more clearly prove that GIs are the root cause of drug-related crimes recently rampant in south Korea. 
					
					For instance, more than 10 drug-related cases were reported from among GIs present in south Korea from January to August 1999.
					
					Later, an officer of the U.S. imperialist 7th Air Force was unearthed while smuggling a large amount of cocaine and family members of GIs were hell-bent on drug smuggling.
					
					The drug smuggled by GIs has given a great damage to south Koreans.
					
					The 1960s witnessed tragedies in which a large number of south Korean women were missing or died of illness after being addicted to drugs.
					
					Even GIs used the drug to satisfy their desires for murder. In March 1970 a drug-addicted GI cut off the heads of Kim Hwa Nam and his wife in Dongduchon, Kyonggi Province and another GI mangled a woman to death by a scissor in Taegu in December 1987. These were small part of the hideous crimes committed by GIs. 
					
					The U.S. imperialist aggression forces are root cause of all misfortunes and pains of south Koreans and a den of crimes.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Studied in Malaysia
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Studied in Malaysia
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- A meeting for explaining the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK was held by the Malaysian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on Jan. 13.
					The chairman of the preparatory committee said that this year is the most significance year marking the centenary of birth of the President and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and a year in which the plan of Kim Jong Il for prosperity will bear shining fruition.
					
					History has known no such a great man as Kim Jong Il who defended socialism and translated all the ideals of the people into brilliant reality with his extraordinary leadership, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					The revolutionary armed forces loyal to the Workers' Party of Korea, the great unity of the army and people rallied close around the WPK, the advantageous socialist system and the solid foundation of the independent national economy are the eternal treasure provided by Kim Jong Il all his life.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un is now standing in the van of the grand march of the Korean people.
					
					The Korean people are filled with the steadfast resolution to reliably defend and glorify the undying feats of Kim Jong Il true to his behests and always follow Kim Jong Un, closely rallied around him.
					
					The Korean people will make greater progress and prosperity this year under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Syria
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Syria
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- Saber Ballul, head of a department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus of Syria, on Jan. 15 issued a statement in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					The statement said:
					
					The Korean people greeted 2012, the New Year, in tears of blood over the untimely demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					The progressive mankind is firmly convinced that the Korean people will register signal successes in the efforts to accomplish the cause of national reunification and build a thriving socialist country, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Jong Il.
					
					We fully support the Korean people's struggle for national reunification.
					
					We heartily wish only victory and glory always to the friendly Korean people advancing under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russian Personages Laud Korean People
articles.content:
Russian Personages Laud Korean People
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are now dynamically advancing, having the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the head of the party, state and army true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il. Such looks are striking the world with wonder.
					A room chief of the Joint Institute for Nuclear Research of Russia made the remarks at the show of Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" on January 12.
					
					Through the film we came to know better about the efforts of Kim Jong Il who devoted all his life to building a thriving nation, he said.
					
					After watching the film, the president of a Russian company said that the Korean people are a very strong people displaying their dignity and might despite the vicious sanctions and pressure by the imperialist allied forces.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Mongolia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Mongolia
Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian preparatory committee to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star was formed with due ceremony in Ulan Bator on January 19.
					Present at the ceremony were personages and members of the Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, Academy of Sciences, Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations, Centre for the Study of Juche and the Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun in Mongolia.
					
					The special report of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea was read out there.
					
					L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful events, including joint seminar of Juche idea study organizations in Mongolia, film show and photo exhibition, on the occasion of February 16, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Lunar New Year Celebrated in China
articles.content:
Lunar New Year Celebrated in China
Beijing, January 23 (KCNA) -- Events took place in China to mark the lunar New Year.
					The C.C., Communist Party and the State Council of China arranged a gathering to mark the lunar New Year at the Great Hall of the People on Jan. 21.
					
					Present there were Hu Jintao, general secretary of the C.C., CPC and president of China, and senior party and state officials and people from all walks of life in the capital city.
					
					Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council, in his speech at the gathering said that 2012 is a year of important significance in the course of China's development. 
					
					He underlined the need to enhance sustainable economic and social development as well as place more importance on people's livelihoods, letting the people share the achievements of reform.
					
					He called for pushing forward the socialist modernization drive in one mind under the leadership of the Party Central Committee with Hu Jintao as its general secretary and greeting the 18th National Congress of the CPC with excellent achievements.
					
					Prior to it, Hu Jintao and other senior party and state officials paid visits to former leaders to extend New Year greetings.
					
					There were also such festive events as army-people art performance, tea party with officials of different nationalities, round-table talks with non-party personages.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de ninos escolares por Ano Nuevo Lunar
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de ninos escolares por Ano Nuevo Lunar
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en el capitalino Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Mangyongdae la funcion de los ninos escolares por el Ano Nuevo Lunar "Eterno pais del Sol".
					La funcion comenzo con la primera escena "Rendimos el saludo del Ano Nuevo Lunar al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un". 
					
					Reflejando unanime alma de todos los ninos escolares del pais, los ejecutantes dedicaron el saludo del Ano Nuevo Lunar al Maximo Dirigente. 
					
					En la escena se pusieron el coro "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il", inmortal himno revolucionario, el solo femenino "Esperamos el Ano Nuevo", la narracion y danza de los ninos escolares coreanos residentes en Japon "Siguiendo siempre al Sol" y otras piezas. 
					
					El concierto de violines "Cancion de la bendicion", obra maestra compuesta por el Dirigente, la danza deportiva "No tenemos que envidiar nada en el mundo" y el concierto de instrumentos musicales nacionales "Es mejor mi pais" conmovieron a los espectadores. 
					
					La funcion termino con el epilogo "Adelante al compas de los pasos del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un", que refleja la voluntad invariable de 3 millones de ninos escolares de seguir al Partido del Trabajo de Corea por el camino de revolucion del Songun.
					
					Vieron la funcion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Yong Chun y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito junto con los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Fueron invitados alli los compatriotas en ultramar, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, los delegados de organizaciones internacionales y los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia intento conflictivo de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia intento conflictivo de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual difundido este martes, el periodico Minju Joson senala que al nombrar en un cargo mas alto al connotado maniaco de enfrentamiento Kim Thae Hyo, el traidor Lee Myung Bak expuso abiertamente su intento conflictivo anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en contrasentido a la opinion publica que desea el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, y continua:
					El traidor Lee hablo de la "paz y estabilidad" y de la abierta "ventana de oportunidad" en su "discurso especial del Ano Nuevo" diciendo que "hay que eliminar la desconfianza reciproca mediante el dialogo". Esto no fue mas que un engano para ocultar su siniestro intento.
					
					Al recibir el informe de trabajo del Ministerio de Reunificacion, Lee no oculto que su banda desea el "estado de emergencia del Norte" diciendo que es posible que se produzca "cierto cambio en la situacion del Norte".
					
					Recientemente, por conducto de unos fulanos y menganos, lanzo una campana demagogica anti-RPDC para tildar como "orquestados" los llantos del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea por el fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Si bien la camarilla surcoreana intenta recrudecer su campana de enfrentamiento fratricida, eso solo adelantara su propio arruinamiento.
					
					Como ya ha declarado, la RPDC ajustara las cuentas hasta el final de los tremendos crimenes inmorales cometidos por los compinches de Lee durante el gran duelo nacional.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a seguir las llamas de Hamnam
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a seguir las llamas de Hamnam
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que para hacer de 2012 el ano de la victoria orgullosa por la era dorada de la prosperidad en acato al legado del gran camarada Kim Jong Il, hay que encender mas furiosamente en todos los sectores y las unidades las llamas de Hamnam.
					La llamarada de Hamnam sirve de bandera del ataque general para lograr una gran victoria en el ano 2012 y para producir un nuevo cambio, comienza el articulo y continua:
					
					En esta llamarada palpitan la idea de pertinaz combate de ataque de cumplir en menos tiempo y en el nivel mas alto las tareas asignadas por el Partido, el fuerte espiritu de autoestima nacional de alcanzar con sus propios esfuerzos el nivel mundial y la disposicion de pioneros a abrir en su localidad y  lugar de trabajo, antes que nadie, las puertas a un Estado poderoso y prospero.
					
					El orgullo de que la nacion de Kim Il Sung es la mas inteligente y talentosa en el mundo, la voluntad y el coraje, con los cuales puede hacer todos, si decide, la determinacion de tomar delantera sin falta en el  mundo con las fuerzas y tecnologias propias, esto es la fuerte dignidad nacional de los habitantes de Hamnam (la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur).
					
					Cuanto mas se acerca el dia de la victoria de la construccion del Estado prospero y se aumenta los firmes pasos de la RPDC,  mas se tornan las maquinaciones de los enemigos para estorbarlos.
					
					Pero, ellos no pueden doblegar, aunque cambie mil veces el mundo, el espiritu revolucionario de los descendientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y los soldados y discipulos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il que superan todas las  dificultades con el espiritu de la dignidad nacional.
					
					Si todos los sectores y las unidades se levantan como los de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y todos los habitantes trabajan como los de esta provincia, la patria llegara rapidamente a la cima de la gran prosperidad.
					
					Cuando todos los habitantes superen todas las pruebas y dificultades y creen los milagros e innovaciones en sus lugares de trabajo con el impetu de vanguardistas de Hamnam, pueden ser orgullosos renovadores y creadores de proezas en la marcha del gran auge.
